mapper.select: select a.user_id, a.movie_id, b.title, b.poster_path, a.write_time from comment a join movie b on a.movie_id=b.movie_id where a.user_id=#{user_id};

SELECT a.id, a.nickname, a.password, a.email, b.profile_img, b.profile_msg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rating r WHERE r.user_id = a.id) AS rating_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.user_id = a.id) AS comment_count FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.id = b.user_id WHERE a.id=#{id} and a.password=#{password}
SELECT r.rating AS rating FROM user a JOIN rating r on a.id=r.user_id JOIN movie m on r.movie_id=m.movie_id WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.id=r.user_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL) VALUES(#{id}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET NICKNAME=#{nickname}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE USER_DETAIL SET PROFILE_IMG=#{profile_img}, PROFILE_MSG=#{profile_msg} WHERE USER_ID=#{id}
